headline: U.S. Challenge to China Lithium Dominance Hobbled by Price Slump
snippet: A sell off in Hong Kong and Chinese shares deepened following a slump in U.S. equities amid persistent concerns about a trade war.

headline: Lithium Miner CEO Sees Shakeout in Race to Supply Electric Cars
snippet: Ganfeng Lithium Co. slumped on its trading debut in Hong Kong as fresh turmoil in global markets added to weaker sentiment in the battery material sector.

headline: China's Rare Earths May Be Tool for Huawei Retaliation
snippet: China’s incentive to keep the electric-battery metal cheap has soured investors on Ganfeng's Hong Kong IPO.

headline: U.S. Lags, China Expands in Race for Electric Vehicle Dominance
snippet: With a ruined 13th Century castle, the Irish town of Carlow is an unlikely staging post in the super-charged rise of a key player in China’s push to dominate the global electric-vehicle revolution.

headline: China Moves Closer to Battery Domination With VW Lithium Deal
snippet: Ganfeng Lithium Co., China’s top producer of the metal used in electric-vehicle batteries, seeks as much as $676 million from a first-time share sale in Hong Kong.

headline: High Risk/High Reward Lithium Bet Drives Argentina Mining Surge
snippet: China’s top producer of lithium, a metal used in electric-vehicle batteries, said it’s agreed a deal with Tesla Inc. to supply a fifth of its production to the vehicle maker, highlighting the push for supply pacts.

headline: What to Watch in Commodities: Iran Deadline, Oil, Gold, Arcelor
snippet: A slump in cobalt prices and the shares of Chinese refiners may provide an ideal bargain-hunting opportunity for investors seeking a piece of the action as Asia’s top economy leads a global boom in electric vehicles.

headline: Lithium-Spinoff CEO Says Shortages Loom Amid Electric-Car Craze
snippet: More than 200 Chinese companies will officially be inducted into MSCI Inc.’s equity indexes after the market close on Thursday, opening up the world’s second-largest equity market -- with its big swings and unique idiosyncrasies -- to global investors.

headline: Here's Where Tesla's Supplier Says Lithium Market Is Headed
snippet: Why are we so relaxed about an emerging oligopoly in the key battery element?

headline: Stock Carnage Spreads to China, Hong Kong With Tencent Tumbling
snippet: How much is a lithium business really worth? Enthusiasts of the metal used in rechargeable batteries are about to find out.

headline: China Lithium King Pummeled in Hong Kong Debut Amid Stocks Rout
snippet: The tripling in lithium prices over three years is poised to fuel a multi-billion dollar rush of deals as major players jostle for dominance to supply the metal needed for the electric vehicle battery revolution.

headline: Falling Lithium Prices Doom Ganfeng Lithium's Hong Kong IPO
snippet: China is spearheading the auto world’s push toward electrification, a shift that is transforming once-niche materials like cobalt and lithium into hot commodities. And it’s Chinese companies leading the way in securing the raw materials needed for a massive expansion in battery capacity. From mines in Africa to huge metal and battery material plants in China, here are some of the suppliers with a key role in feeding the country’s electric vehicle ambitions.

headline: The Battery Boom Has Created a New Lithium Superpower in China
snippet: The booming electric vehicle revolution is flowing through to the bottom line of a growing list of global miners, who are reaping higher profits from rising demand for battery raw materials.

headline: Tesla Supplier Ganfeng Lithium Seeks $676 Million in Share Sale
snippet: In the global rush to supply the electric-car revolution, lithium hot spot Argentina is grappling with a shortage of talent.

headline: Chinese Lithium Giant Agrees Three-Year Pact to Supply Tesla
snippet: Ground zero in the global scramble for lithium is a small patch of northern Australia’s iron-ore rich outback, where work is accelerating to deliver the world’s next major mines to feed soaring demand from electric vehicle battery makers.

headline: Cobalt Stocks in China Are Poised for New Jolt as EV Boom Powers On
snippet: In the first day of trading after China said it’s working on a deadline to end sales of fossil-fuel-powered vehicles, shares are holding ground in the oil companies that stand to lose out.

headline: The 200-Plus China Stocks That Are About to Join MSCI's Indexes
snippet: A scramble by the lithium market’s biggest players to tie up supply of the high-tech metal is gathering pace in the 170-year-old heartland of Australia’s $90 billion mining industry.

headline: Time to Block the Lithium Cartel
snippet: Plans by one of the world’s top lithium producers to accelerate output could lead to a shortage of the light metal used in electric-car batteries in five years, according to the Chilean government’s development agency.

headline: FMC Is About to Find Out How Much Big Lithium Is Worth With IPO
snippet: Argentina has some good news for Elon Musk’s Tesla Inc., and bad news for mining producers in Chile and Australia: the country may be about to flood the market with lithium.

headline: The Lithium Sector Surge Is Poised to Ignite a Bonanza for Deals
snippet: BYD Co., China’s largest electric car and bus manufacturer, plans to obtain supplies of lithium to guard against spiraling costs of the raw material used in vehicle batteries, amid rising pressure on automakers to lower prices.

headline: Here Are the Firms Feeding China's Battery Revolution
snippet: Electric-car demand and tight supplies will drive prices higher.

headline: The Electric Vehicle Future Is Already Boosting Miners’ Earnings
snippet: China Everbright Bank Co. rose 18 percent on its debut in Shanghai after completing the nation’s second-largest initial public offering this year, as the stock market recovers from a three-month slump.
